description:
Four men are assigned to Nanba, the world`s most formidable prison. Jyugo, a man who attempted to break out of prison and ended up extending his jail time; Uno, a man who likes to gamble with women; Rock, a man who likes to get into fights; and Nico, a man who likes anime. A super exciting action comedy about the daily lives of the prison`s inmates and guards.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Jyugo escapes from prison again and Hajime Sugoroku goes looking for him again.
Uno, Nico, and Rock are having a good time in Building 13.
It’s a usual day for the inmates and guards.
Many things have happened, but it seems like nothing has changed in Nanba Prison.
But don’t let your guard down!
Mitsuru Hitokoe, sensing a disturbance in the air, goes spying on each building believing something will happen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nanbaka wa Gag Anime de Aru.
ナンバカはギャグアニメである.

REGULAR.description:
A new guard has come to Building 13. 
It’s Hajime Sugoroku’s brother(?), Hitoshi Sugoroku.
This takes Hajime by surprise and he tries to lecture Hitoshi to go home, but he has already been hired.
Meanwhile, Uno and Rock starts doubting Hitoshi, who can pull off a woman’s guard clothes nicely, is actually a gorilla’s... or Hajime’s brother. 
To find out the truth, the 2 announce the beginning of Cell 13’s customary game of tag.
Source: crunchyroll

Yamato takes Rock and Tsukumo to Building 5 for training.
Rock challenges Samon to a duel, but he is defeated by only one finger.
The warden gathers all the supervising officers before she leaves for her business trip.
Nimaijita, the deputy supervisor of Building 2, blames Samon that Nanba Prison’s reputation is ruined because of what happened in Building 5 in the past.
Unable to take it any longer, Samon leaves the room. 
This is because someone important to Samon is related to this incident.
Source: crunchyroll

Rock and Yamato suddenly become violent after returning from Building 5 and attack Jyugo and Seitarou.
Covered in bruises, Jyugo tries his best to protect Uno and Nico.
Tsukumo, who has been training in Building 5 with Rock, appears.
Hajime knocks out Yamato and realizes a familiar yellow talisman on the nape of Yamato’s neck.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Quelque chose ne tourne pas rond

REGULAR.description:
Hajime, Jyugo, Uno, and Nico head to Building 5 to find out about Rock and Yamato.
Jyugo and the others fall into a trap and end up in level 1 underground cell.
There, they find the captured Upa and Liang.
Meanwhile, Hajime is captured by Inori and is escorted to the underground cell where Samon, covered in injuries, is restrained.
Samon reveals who’s behind the incident.
It is no other than Enki Gokuu, the former Building 5 supervisor who became a criminal causing havoc in Nanba Prison in the past. He is also Samon’s brother.
Source: crunchyroll

Jyugo, Uno, Nico, Liang, Upa, Honey, and Trois make their way through Building 5 underground cell to find the captured guards.
They hide in the file room and Jyugo finds document about himself and finds a shocking information.
The group encounters a Building 5 guard, Rokuriki, who is under someone’s control.
Liang and Upa tells Jyugo to keep going while they take care of Rokuriki.
Source: crunchyroll

The escaped convict, Hachiman, appears in front of Liang and Upa.
Nico has remained with them to help.
Hachiman, former boss of Liang and the others, uses a large weapon and poison to attack.
That poison was provided by Qi, who has betrayed Building 5 and joined Hachiman.
Meanwhile, Uno and Jyugo are concerned about Nico, who doesn’t have his medication.
It seems something horrible will happen to Nico is he doesn’t take his medicine...
Source: crunchyroll

The medication completely gone from his system, Nico suffers and goes berserk.
Wanting his medicine, Nico attacks Hachiman.
Upa and Liang is surprised to see Nico in that state.
Then, the traitor, Qi, appears.
Qi understands medications can turn into poison if they’re not handled properly.
He remembers the days when Hachiman used to treat him like a tool along with Upa and Liang.
Source: crunchyroll

Beating Hachiman, Nico, Liang, and Upa moves ahead guided by Qi.
Upa feels someone other than Enki is involved in the incident.
Jyugo, Uno, Honey, and Trois reaches level 3 underground.
They encounter Ruka Gojyou, a former Building 5 guard who has escaped from his cell.
Ruka, along with guards, Youriki and Kokoriki, attacks Jyugo’s party. 
Running away from Ruka, Honey starts getting irritated at the incompetent Jyugo.
Source: crunchyroll

Jyugo and the others continue to run from Ruka’s attack.
But Honey tells Jyugo not to follow them because he believes Jyugo’s only in their way.
Jyugo starts to self-reflect from Honey’s lecture and starts revealing about himself to Uno.
However, Ruka is quickly approaching.
Jyugo and Uno are saved by someone unexpected.
Source: crunchyroll

Jyugo, Uno, Nico, Trois are attacked by Ruka’s powerful weapon, Bashosen.
Honey tries to fight him off, but at this rate, all four will perish.
Trois tells Jyugo and Uno to go ahead of them while they fight Ruka.
Uno takes Jyugo’s hand and run towards the stairs.
But Jyugo is concerned about Honey and Trois who are fighting for them...
Source: crunchyroll

Jyugo heads toward the cell Hajime is trapped in on his own.
In the underground level 2, Uno, Trois, and Honey are looking for a certain guard relying on the smell.
Enki finds out Jyugo and the others have escaped.
Bruised all over, Jyugo finally reaches to Hajime’s cell on level 5.
However, Hajime says something very heartless to Jyugo.
Source: crunchyroll

SPECIAL.description:
Seitarou Tanabata is all fired up for his first teaching job at a high school
But Nanba Building 13 High School l is filled with delinquents.
The students are troublemakers and even the teachers are odd.
Seitarou is already bullied by 4 students in the 3rd year, class 13 on his first day.
Then, the number 1 troublemaker, Hajime Sugoroku, returns after serving his suspencion.
Can Seitarou ever become the teacher he always wanted to be?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 出席番号のついたバカたち!
